ingredients: 2 cups all-purpose flour, 1 teaspoon baking powder,   +   1/2 teaspoon baking soda,   +   1/2 teaspoon salt, 1 cup white sugar,   +   1/2 cup butter, 2 large eggs, 1   +   1/4 teaspoons vanilla, 1   +   1/2 cups chopped apples
nutrition: Total Fat 10g 12%, Saturated Fat 6g 29%, Cholesterol 54mg 18%, Sodium 255mg 11%, Total Carbohydrate 41g 15%, Dietary Fiber 1g 4%, Total Sugars 24g, Protein 3g, Vitamin C 1mg 4%, Calcium 33mg 3%, Iron 1mg 7%, Potassium 63mg 1%
